document_data.caption: A map showing Manasowar just north of Saikhoi.
document_data.name: Manasowar
document_data.mainbody: '''Manasowar''' was a large lake found in [[Ra-Khati]].
document_data.Geopgraphy: Located deep within the [[Katakoro Shan]] range, Manasowar sat just north of the capital city of [[Saikhoi]]. It was fed by a smaller tributary of the [[Gogrus River]] to the west, and flowed into the [[Akundi River]] to the east.
